title: PS5 VR, Delays, and 2021 Slate - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.23.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg wade through a ton of PlayStation news and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:45 - Housekeeping
  -  The Roper Report   -
00:05:07 - PLAYSTATION PANDEMONIUM
00:12:30 - “What are your thoughts on the new PSVR for PS5 still requiring a single cord?” - DJ Brad Chill
00:33:35 - “Could you see Sony releasing PSVR exclusives on PC or occulus quest?” - The Floofy Boy
00:38:40 -  Ads 
00:43:15 - PlayStation in 2021
00:44:32 - “ I wonder if Kratos’ omission of a similar announcement means good things…” - Lexus
00:52:15 - Vampire the Masquerade is screwed
00:56:06 - Quick Hits
01:06:27 - You‘re Wrong
01:07:34 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andrea
